pages.text: Bloodhounds are excellent trackers originally bred for tracking various game, though they're now used more commonly as search-and-rescue or police dogs.$(br2)Standing barely over a block tall, these sharp-nosed dogs come in three coats.
Bloodhounds are found most commonly in heavily forested biomes such as jungles and dark oak forests. You can also find them in a variety of other forests.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Mutton Treat.
